# komodor_user (Resource)

Creates a Komodor User

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "komodor_user" "my-user" {
  display_name = "my-user"
  email = "email@example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `display_name` (String)
- `email` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `updated_at` (String)
